listitem.para: a point inside the fundamental rectangle defined by the elliptic integral; x is a vector of complex numbers

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Jacobi 's sn elliptic function with parameter m: the inverse of the elliptic integral for the parameter m.
The amplitude am is computed in fortran and the addition formulas for elliptic functions are applied

refsection.title: Examples
